title: The Scary Mirror
description: You’re entering a show that is slightly different from previous, very similar shows. That one with the phone call from the devil? Now, it’s a FaceTime call from the devil. Prepare to see your unflattering reflection in… The Scary Mirror.
quote: And check the price of my NFTs ’cause I'm an important tech guy!
altHero: tech guy getting zapped by his car
alt1: flying car in a futuristic city on stilts
alt2: tech guy driving car with AI on a screen
alt4: AI driving the car into an Impassable Burger restaurant
